channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Automobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Automobile

item.title: CVE-2017-14911|2024-09-17T02:48:11.888Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20automobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-01-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Automobile APQ8096AU, MDM9206, MDM9650, MSM8996AU, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 835, it is possible for the XBL loader to skip the authentication of device config.
